author: schor
msg: [UIMA-409] allow setting the slot which references the _Type instance in a JCas object.
This slot is updated when the object is reused from the cache, to reference the
view associated with the latest reuse.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-409] Using new Sofa(...) constructor failed to create a corresponding view, which
could lead to failures when the CAS was reset.  Also - added comment to clarify meaning
of poorly named feature (design changed after the feature was set in stone).

author: clombart
msg: Add unit test for copy & move methods

author: clombart
msg: Review the implementation of the move method.
If the workspace.move is used, the source node is not deleted.
If the session.move, it works fine (the source node is deleted).
I don't know why and start a new discussion on the mailing list.

author: hindessm
msg: Fixing junit usage - use assertEquals w/parameters in the correct order.
